price: ߊ߬ߟߎ߬ ߦߴߌ ߢߌ߬ߣߌ߲߬ߞߊ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߞߎ߬ߙߎ ߟߎ߫ ߡߊ߬ ، ߊ߬ ߝߐ߫ ߞߏ߫ ߒ ߡߊ߰ߙߌ ߦߴߏ߬ ߟߎ߫ ߓߍ߬ߛߍ߲߬ߞߍ߬ ߟߊ߫ ߟߋ߬ ߓߘߎߓߘߍ߫
arabic: وَيَسۡـَٔلُونَكَ عَنِ ٱلۡجِبَالِ فَقُلۡ يَنسِفُهَا رَبِّي نَسۡفٗا

version.title: N'ko translation - Baba Mamadi
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the N'ko language, translated by Karamo / Baba Mamadi Jani.

meta.transliteration: wayasalūnaka ʿani al-jibāli faqul yansifuhā rabbī nasfan
